description: Using packard bell dot s 2Gb ram. Due to being unable to see the bottom line of the playing area. please address this issue as it seems to be common to lots of game programs.
One of the best implementation for the classical japanese game!
I've been looking for a free version of Go for Ubuntu & it's finally here! Really enjoying it.
i attempted to install this app on my laptop and it says that it is not supported
Great AI for its size, tidy interface.

Works great. Love the slider for difficulty. Has some issues on fullscreen before starting a game. Also, had to restart for game to actually work (was stuck on white's move), but after that has worked great.
summary: Pretty and functional with some minor issues

description: Kigo est une interface de jeu. En lui meme, ce programme ne peut pas jouer au Go. Pas meme en humain contre humain. Il lui faut au moins GnuGo.
Cette reproduction du jeu Go est très réussie et fonctionne très bien. Nous pouvons jouer contre l'ordinateur et choisir le niveau de difficulté.
